meanings.definition: The state or quality of being somber or gloomy.
meanings.sent1: The sombernesses of the room made everyone feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The sombernesses of the funeral created a solemn mood.
meanings.sent3: Despite the sombernesses of the situation, they found a way to smile.
meanings.sent4: The sombernesses of the storm clouds matched his melancholy mood.
meanings.sent5: The sombernesses of the graveyard at night sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: A somber or gloomy atmosphere or feeling.
meanings.sent1: The sombernesses in the air hinted at an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: The sombernesses of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The sombernesses of the movie theater made her giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The sombernesses of the forest enveloped them like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The sombernesses of the abandoned building made her heart race with fear.
